name: DinoMeteor
description:
Your mission is to stay alive as long as possible, you can achieve it by shooting the meteors with pterosaurs or avoiding them completely. But remember, you can't postpone the inevitable forever.

Made in Tartu Mängujämm 2022 for Ludium Dare 50 by team MURUNIIDUK (Joonas Halapuu, Robert Koor, Mia Mägi, Mirell Jakobson, Kaisa Viru and Karl Erik Saks).

PS: You might need to install python in order to run it.
